textAfterTable: The School of History and the Centre for American Studies at the University of Kent present a multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary conference for academics at all levels to be held on September 4, 2004. The aim of the conference is to consider the background, the impact, and the legacy of the Supreme Courtï¿½s landmark desegregation decision fifty years after it was announced. Papers from all academic disciplines are welcomed and should aim to be 20-25 minutes in length. Panel proposals are welcome, and scholars willing to act as moderators or discussants should indicate their area of interest. Emma Long School of History University of Kent Canterbury Kent, CT2 7NX United Kingdom Email: ejl4@kent.ac.uk Didn't find what you're looking for? Try our power search!
